original_text: Ye shall fall by the sword; I will judge you in the border of Israel; and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 너희가 칼에 엎드러질 것이라 내가 이스라엘 변경에서 너희를 심판하리니 너희는 내가 여호와인 줄을 알리라

sentences.original_text: Ye shall fall by the sword;
I will judge you in border of Israel;
and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너희가 내가 여호와인 줄 알리라.
